resources.string:
In order to get the CORE functionality of Dynamic Wallpaper which changes throughout the day, Kaagaz Requires to Keep a Background Service Running.

Due to Limitations of Android System you'll need to Disable Battery Optimisations for only this app

Otherwise the Wallpapers won't change with time and will be always static. The Battery Consumption is negligible.

You may Decline the Prompt, however declining the Prompt will set a static wallpaper that will not be dynamic
Navigate To Battery>Battery optimisation>Tap NOT OPTIMISED>All apps>Kaagaz>Don\'t Optimise or ANY OTHER BATTERY EXCLUSIONS AVAILABLE
After Doing The Above Step, Restart the App and Voila! Your Dynamic Desktop will be then delivered to you in a while!
Error Initializing Startup Service, Turn off Battery Optimisations to Start
Based on Your Xiaomi Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Saver to \'NO Restrictions\'
Based on Your Oppo Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Related Exclusions. If not available restart the app!
Based on Your Vivo Device, You\'ll need to disable Battery Related Exclusions. If not available restart the app!
Not Yet, Try Completing Steps Again!
